&ltTBL>.IS_VALID() Syntax Result_Flag as L = &ltTBL>.IS_VALID() Description The &ltTBL>.IS_VALID() method returns .T. (TRUE) if the table is valid; otherwise, it returns .F. (FALSE). Example dim ptr as P ptr = table.open("customer") ? ptr.is_valid() ? .T.
